alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 12:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, SOUTHEASTERN RIPLEY, SOUTHERN DEARBORN, SWITZERLAND, EASTERN CARROLL, SOUTHERN BOONE AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EDT... At 1255 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Vevay, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg, Carrollton, Aurora, Rising Sun, Vevay, Dillsboro, Florence, Wilmington, Pleasant, French, Hartford, Fairview, Ghent, Patriot, Center Square, Braytown, Aberdeen, Cold Springs, Big Bone Lick and Waterloo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
